key.name: activation-policy
key.summary: What to do with executable text files when activated
key.description: What to do with executable text files when they are activated. Possible values are "launch" to launch them as programs, "ask" to ask what to do via a dialog, and "display" to display them as text files.

key.name: open-dir-in-new-window
key.summary: Whether open directory in a new window.
key.description: Wheather open directory in a new window. If not, open directory in a new tab.

key.name: click-policy
key.summary: Type of click used to launch/open files.
key.description: Possible values are "single" to launch files on a single click, or "double" to launch theme on a double click.

key.name: view
key.description: Possible values are "icon-view", "list-view" and "cascading-view".

key.name: sort-order
key.description: Possible values are "name", "size", "filetype", "modified_time"("mtime"), "accessed_time"("atime"), "open-with" and "tag-info"

key.name: show-thumbnail
key.description: Possible values are 'always' to always show thumbnails, 'never' to never show thumbnails.

key.name: thumbnail-size-unit
key.summary: The unit of thumbnail size limitation.
key.description: Possible values are "Byte", "KiB", "MB", "GB", "TB", "PB".

key.name: thumbnail-size-limitation
key.description: Files over this size won't be thumbnailed. The purpose of this setting is to avoid thumbnailing large files that may take a long time to load or use lots of memory.

key.name: show-zipped-file-in-directory
key.summary: Whether to show the content of zipped file in directory.
key.description: Possible types are zip, tar, tar.gz, bz.

key.name: confirm-trash
key.description: If value is true, a confirm dialog will be shown.

key.name: confirm-empty-trash
key.summary: Whether confirm when empty trash can.
key.description: If value is true, a confirm dialog will be shown.

key.name: allow-delete-immediatly
key.description: Files can be delete immediatly, which means files deleted won't be moved to trash can. This feature can be dangerous, so use caution.

key.name: show-hidden-files
key.description: If true, hidden files will be shown as well.

key.name: show-hidden-files-in-search-result
key.summary: Show hidden file in search result.
key.description: This option is orthogonal to show-hidden-files.

key.name: show-function-bar
key.description: If true the function bar will be shown if needed.

key.name: label-position
key.description: Possible values are "bottom", "right".

key.name: show-extension-name
key.description: If true, show extension name.

key.name: show-brief
key.summary: Whether to show brief for files.
key.description: Brief differs from filetypes, for instances, images will show revolution, files will show size, directory will show item number, symbolic link gets nothing.

key.name: autoplay-audio-video
key.summary: Whether to autoplay audio and video.
key.description: If true, autoplay audio and video when preview.

key.name: sidebar-display-mode
key.summary: Display icon or text on sidebar.
key.description: Possible values are 'icon-and-text' and 'icon'.

key.name: thumbnail-size
key.description: The default size of an icon for a thumbnail in the icon view.

key.name: icon-scale-level
key.description: Defaut icon scale level used by the icon view.

key.name: thumbnail-size
key.description: The default size of an icon for a thumbnail in the list view.

key.name: icon-scale-level
key.description: Defaut icon scale level used by the list view.

key.name: columns-order
key.description: Columns order in list view.

key.name: visible-columns
key.description: Possible values are "label", "size", "mtime", "filetype".

key.name: manual-position
key.description: If true, the items on desktop can be placed on anywhere.

key.name: auto-arrangement
key.description: Items on desktop will always be placed one by one, and order doesn't mater.

key.name: stickup-grid
key.description: If true, the items on desktop will get the position stickup to grid.

key.name: show-computer-icon
key.summary: Whether show computer icon on desktop.
key.description: If true, show it.

key.name: show-trash-icon
key.summary: Whether show trash icon on desktop.
key.description: If true, show it.

key.name: show-trashed-item-number
key.summary: Whether show trashed item number on contextmenu.
key.description: If true, show it.
